attributes.action: apologise for the illegal and heinous act of Child Migration to Aust during the period from 1947 to 1967 .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any nation that does not care for and protect all of its children
does not deserve to be called a nation.
       NELSON MANDELA
                                          
---------------------------------------
From 1947 thru 1967 indigenous British children were systematically sent in consignments to Aust as orphans. None of them were orphaned !They were thrust into the hands of the most cruellest order of ' guardians'at Bindoon, Clontarf, Tardun and Castledare, sanctioned by the British Labour Govt of Clement Attlee. Many were to suicide following their release from these places. In 1948, a boat called the 'Empire Windrush'was to disembark 492 foreigners from Jamaica to settle here. And hence,in regular streams from Asia, Africa and elsewhere, immigrants with THEIR children were granted permission to reside in the land that the child emigrants were ejected from! I ask the PM to  APOLOGISE to those that were so badly dealt with by the British Labour Party and subsequent Govt's .    James.R.Green.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions which call upon the PM to "recognise", "apologise" or "acknowledge" something, as they do not clearly call for a recognisable action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
